content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The final price was not reached as the negotiation was terminated by Haoyu Wang.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As a landlord, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8. He was polite, reasonable, and willing to negotiate, which are all qualities I appreciate in a potential tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Haoyu Wang conducted himself respectfully and professionally.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: N/A Since I did not feel discriminated or offended, I cannot provide a reason for such an occurrence.
